features.name: Fully Implemented Slash Commands
features.value: The bot now fully uses Slash Commands!

features.name: DMs Support
features.value: You can now use (most) commands in DMs!

features.name: No More Prefix Commands
features.value: Old prefix commands have been removed. Make sure to use Slash Commands!

features.name: Command Permissions v2
features.value: Moderation commands now use [Command Permissions v2](https://discord.com/blog/slash-commands-permissions-discord-apps-bots), which won't show Slash Commands to you if you don't have perms to use them

features.name: Improved `/meme`
features.value: You can now refresh the meme you qot by clickinq a sinqle button

features.name: Improvements and Buqfixes
features.value: The bot is a lot faster now and it no lonqer has certain problems
